text: Víctor Manzanilla Schaffer (13 November 1924 – 7 April 2019) was a Mexican politician and diplomat. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). He was Mexico's ambassador to China and its first to North Korea. He served for two terms as a member of the Senate. He also served one term as a member of the Chamber of Deputies. He was the Governor of Yucatán from February 1988 to February 1991. He was born in Mexico City. Manzanilla Schaffer died on 7 April 2019 in Irapuato, Guanajuato. He was 94. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Mexico Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:People from Yucatán (state)
title: Víctor Manzanilla Schaffer
